description.en: MOBILINK-NETWORK, the 1st global mobile telecom provider, introduces the first borderless, telecommunications network built on blockchain technology with the MOBILINK-COIN. MOBILINK-COIN (MBX) will eliminate all mobile monthly fees by replacing the smartphone user's current mobile SIM card with a MOBILINK-SIM Card. Ad revenue generated by browser, search engine and app activity will be totaled and shared across the network giving consumers an ongoing financial return on their initial investment plus no monthly fees.
